title: Lore based, friendly, casual club recruiting. Please take a look! :)
body:
{{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:238}} 

Are you a fan of the ninjas of Runeterra? I am. As an Akali main, I saw a perfect opportunity with the recent addition of clubs to LoL. I made a club based off of the lore of League of Legends, specifically, Shen and Zed's lore, and the Kinkou Clan. I am certainly not amazing at League, but that's fine! Because this isn't meant to be a competitive club, this club is meant to be a lore friendly, social environment where you can meet new people with similar tastes. Once again, this
club is just for fun, and not competitive. Not a Shen, Akali, Kennen or Zed main? That's cool! Come chill and hang out anyway, this club is intended for fans of the lore and the ninjas, but anyone is allowed! :) So come join, have some fun, and shhh, you're a ninja. :)

Add IntruderRed and message me, asking about the clan for an invite. :)
